titleStmt.title: A nevv, cheape and delicate fire of cole-balles wherein seacole is by the mixture of other combustible bodies, both sweetened and multiplied. Also a speedie way for the winning of any breach: with some other new and seruiceable inuentions answerable to the time.
titleStmt.author: Plat, Hugh, Sir, 1552-1611?
